doc.field: The Tamiment Library Artwork Collection consists of artworks found in the collection and artworks donated to the Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives. The artworks consist of paintings, drawings, sculptures, and plaques and depict labor and political leaders from the United States and other countries. The artworks date from 1880 to 2010.

The Tamiment Library Artwork Collection consists of artworks found in the collection and artworks donated to the Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives. The artworks consist of paintings, drawings, sculptures, and plaques and depict labor and political leaders from the United States and other countries. The artworks date from 1880 to 2010.

The Tamiment Library Artwork Collection consist of paintings, drawings, sculptures, and plaques and depict labor and political leaders from the United States and other countries. The artworks date from 1880 to 2010.
The Tamiment Library Artwork Collection was created in 2016 to track artworks that had been found in the collection and artworks donated to the Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives.
Materials found in collection; there is no documentation concerning the provenance of these materials.
